short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that suggests exercise matches based on user input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple tool that makes it easier for individuals working with IntakeQ practice management software to select specific exercises for HEP assignments directly from their Physitrack exercise libraries. The extension listens for keypress updates to the specific HEP assignment field and sends the text value to a Physitrack endpoint along with the necessary authentication tokens to look up relevant exercises based on the keyword. The Physitrack endpoint response is then shown in a dropdown that makes it easy for the user to select the specific exercise they would like to assign with a click.

If a note is updated, the extension will also give the user the option to automatically sync it with Physitrack, generating a new Physitrack program assigned to the patient based on the content of the IntakeQ note.
